bug.summary: Race condition in POA triggers assertion failure
bug.text: There is a race condition in the POA between deactivating an object and it being etherealised, which can trigger an assertion failure (which in turn throws an omniORB::fatalException()).

bug.summary: C++ back-end claims that it does not support long long
bug.text: A new check added to the C++ back-end incorrectly reported that long long is not supported, even though it is. Note that long long is not currently supported in Any.
